MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://pad.asp-software.org

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: HEX/Ascii encoder for file, udp and tcp

English.Char_Desc_45: A free (open source) log monitor/log viewer
English.Char_Desc_80: A free log monito/viewer for files,folders, event log, sql tables, rss, udp, tcp
English.Char_Desc_250: A free (open source) log monitor/log viewer for; Files and folders, Incomming UDP and TCP traffic, EventLogs, SQLServer adn MySql tables, Atom and RSS feeds
English.Char_Desc_450: A log monitor/viewer for;Files and folders,Incomming UDP and TCP traffic,EventLogs, SQLServer and MySql tables, Atom and RSS feeds. FEATURES: Listens to UDP ports. Monitors local and remote event logs. Monitors log files or folders. Monitors MS SQL-Server tables. Monitors Atom and RSS feeds. Can highlight or hide messages depending on content. Supports multiple simultaneous listeners in each session. Supports several simultaneous sessions (MDI)
English.Char_Desc_2000:
A free (open source) log monitor/log viewer for: * Files * Incomming UDP and TCP traffic * EventLogs * SQL tables * Atom and RSS feeds * StdOut / StdErr / COM
FEATURES: Listens to UDP and TCP ports either in broadcast or single endpoint mode. Monitors an eventlog, uses events on the local machine and polling on remote machines. Monitors a log file or folder. Doing a tail using polling. Monitors a table in a MS SQL-Server or MySql database. Doing a tail using polling. Monitors Atom and RSS feeds. Monitors StdOut / StdErr of applications Can highlight or hide messages depending on content. Supports multiple simultaneous listeners in each session. Supports several simultaneous sessions (MDI).
